A weary, somewhat sad looking gnome, except when intrigued by magic, tinkering, or mischief when he lights up with enthusiasm.

Toab wears a bland tan robe and pointy hat.

Often seen with mug of ale, held by mage hand.

Currently cursed by a candy that turned his skin blue.

Spell books found:
 * UnderlandMagicSpellbook
 * MagicFromBeyondTheMirror
 
 
After defeating LordRoaringhorn in a game of chess, he rewards Toab with the amulet that controls the ShieldGuardian.

Items to sell:
 * elvish chainmail
